OOC: Replying to Airly's post first, going in that sequence.

BIC:

Inside =
the Ark, Tucson puts his hand over his chest, and gently does as Talon had =
asked.  Softly putting her into a peaceful state of stasis.

" Sleep well T=
alon, I promise when you awake I will set things right."

He had now found =
out that his arrow had no effect on Nightrazor.  And to see what had happen=
ed next, just futher infuriates the large Autobot leader.  He was NOT about=
 to let things go to Hell now.  These were his comrades and HIS Ark.  He ha=
d not resorted to his full brutality because he simply believed that he mus=
t keep himself in reserve.  But that was over now.  He realized he had to b=
e a brute to fend off those who were now throwing their weight around in a =
place where they truely did not belong.  His eyes narrow dangerously.

"THA=
T'S IT!  I'VE HAD ENOUGH!"

He senses where Megatron's body was laying down=
, and slams his foot on his chest, pointing an arrow straight for it!

" HY=
DRAS, NIGHTRAZOR, CYCLONUS, SCOURGE!  IF YOU ARE WITHIN RANGE OF MY COMMUNI=
CATIONS HEAR THIS!  YOU DARE TO HARM MY FELLOW MAXIMALS AND AUTOBOTS, AND T=
HREATEN TO TAKE THEIR LIVES!  WELL, I HAVE NEWS FOR YOU TOO!  YOU'VE LEFT M=
E NO CHOICE BUT TO DO THE SAME TO YOU AS WELL!  I HAVE MEGATRON'S BODY UNDE=
R MY FOOT, AND AN ARROW STRAIGHT FOR HIS CHEST CHAMBER!  YOU STEP FOOT ANY =
FURTHER INTO MY ARK, TAKE ANOTHER AUTOBOT OR MAXIMAL AND I SWEAR I'LL BE SU=
RE HE NEVER WAKES UP!  PERIOD!"

His voice echoes throught the Ark.  With e=
ach word he rattles the Ark, voice booming like that of an angry lion.  He =
was sick of the Predacons and Decepticon's attack on his Ark, and he holds =
his position over Megatron and awaits their response before doing anything =
to anyone.  Yet, the arrow remains pointed for a perfect shot to the fallen=
 Megatron's chest!

He then turns his head to Rodimus.

" I want you to kno=
w you have full permission to permanently disable any predacons or Deceptic=
ons you see fit.  Scour the parameters of the Ark, and be sure no one gets =
in, Rodimus.  I'll handle Nightrazor in here."

His rage returns to Megatro=
n's fallen body.  How badly he just wanted to act on impulse and finish the=
 job.  Something was holding him back from doing that, yet he so wanted to =
just end it all there and now.

" If I truely believed I could do whatever =
I wanted, I would have made sure that you never wake up from your stasis.  =
You'd be one less piece of scrap Optimus Prime would have to worry about in=
 the future!"

Out of sheer anger, he kicks the body forcefully with a loud=
 slam!

Straight Shot senses something a miss in him.

"Tucson, you're begi=
nning to creep me out, what's wrong with you?"

She comes out of her cross =
bow mode and lets up the aim over Megatron's chest.  She looks up to her lo=
ng time companion.

" I'd do anything for you but what you're making me do =
now, I can't. You heard what Perceptor said, if you alter anything now, it =
could have serious reprocussions later on."

Tucson breathes deeply.

" If =
this is the only way I can get through to them, then so be it."

Straight S=
hot gasps.

"This isn't you Tucson, and you certainly did NOT become a Prim=
e by stooping to their level, because really, that's what you're doing! You=
're much better than that Tucson I know you can be better than that.  Pleas=
e, try.  Try not to do anything you'll regret down the road.  I know it's h=
ard and I know these guys really ticked you off, and I'd be ticked too, if =
all this was going down right under my nose. That temper of yours is danger=
ous, and this isn't the time to lose it."

Tucson kneels down and puts a ha=
nd on her shoulder.

" That's it, keep going."

She raises a brow.  And the=
n gives a coy grin.

" Ohhhhh, ohhh, ohhhh...  Now I get it."

She nodds as=
 does he.  It was an act.  An act he hoped would stump the living sparks ou=
t of all of them. He knew he couldn't avoid stumping his comrades but he kn=
ew that in the long run it was the only way to save them.  This was it, maj=
or Charisma to the test.

Straight Shot now gets back into her weapon mode =
and picks up where she left off.  Arrow to Megatron's chest.

" Uhh uh, the=
re is no way, I'm doing what you're asking of me!  Sorry!  NO GO!"

Tucson =
continues the act.

"You'll do as I say, it must be done!"

Meanwhile, Outs=
ide, Quickstride quickly gets Uproar to his feet, and assesses the situatio=
n.  He then looks around the parameters and then remembers a body of goop, =
that resembled a tar pit, not far from the Ark's parameters.  Uproar looks =
to him.

"What is it? You okay"

Quickstride pats him on the shoulder.

"Ju=
st fine.  Remember that pool of gunk I found a few clicks from here?  Some =
sorta tar pit?"

Uproar nodds.

"Ohh yeah, that.  Why'dya bring that up now=
?"

Quickstride grins.

" I got an idea.  What if we did a fake surrender, =
and y'know.."

Uproar nodds.

" I get it.  Wonder if they'd fall for it?  I=
t's worth a try."

Uproar and Quickstride now approach Deep Stryke and the =
others with their hands up in submission. Quickstride is the first to appro=
ach them.

"Okay, okay, you got us, you got us.  Why don't we just show you=
 guys an easy way inta the ark hmm?  That way we all get what we want and e=
veryone's happy."  

Far outside the parameters of the Ark, Night Shift and=
 Rat Trap look up in awe at the dinosaurs around them.  Yet they keep quiet=
  so is not to alarm them.  Yet, contact could not be helped as a young Ste=
gasaurous noses up to Night Shift, who is not in the least bit frightened b=
y it.

"Woah, check this out."

Rat Trap gasps.

"Ohh geeze, let's hope it'=
s parents ain't around here somewhere."

The baby dinosaur groans, and look=
s back into the brush.  Night Shift curiously follows it, and notices a lar=
ger stegasaurous standing there with a foot raised, with a large piece of w=
ood lodged in it's left front foot.

"Hey, don't go too close ta that thing=
!  We dunno if it's friendly!"

Yelps Rat Trap, as Night Shift approaches i=
t.  He looks back to Rat Trap casually.

"It's okay, if it was gonna do som=
ethn' it would've done it by now. Okay big fella, easy.  This is gonna hurt=
."

With a swift hand he pulls the thorn out of the dino's foot.  The dino =
roars slightly but is quickly relieved of his pain.  He's soon joined by hi=
s mate, and it's clear to see, that this was a family of Stegasaurouses.  H=
e looks down to Night Shift, and nudges his hand with his nose gently.

"It=
's okay big guy, no sweat, you go back with your family."

The stegasaurous=
es now retreat back into the forest, yet the little one looks back once mor=
e thankfully and then retreats.  Rat trap smiles as he watches them retreat=
.

" Talk about meetn' some pretty large friends.  I wonder if they'd be sm=
art enough ta help us out if we needed 'em?"

Night Shift raises a brow.

"=
 I dunno, but judgn' by the way they treated us, I bet they might just reme=
mber who we are if we came back this way.  If not by facial recognition but=
 by smell...  Well, we better get gon'.  We got a lotta ground ta cover." 
=

Carefully he continues the trek onward.  Without warning, he and Rat Trap =
suddenly find themselves on the back of the dino who they had just helped.
=

"Woah, what the?!"

Rat Trap holds onto the dino's massive scales.

" You =
were right, he remembered ya. Looks like he wants ta give us a lift."

Nigh=
t Shift smiles.

"Not a bad idea, we cover more ground this way."

The Steg=
asaurous walks slowly followed by his mate and hatchling.

>
